steps.1: Go to Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
steps.5: Choose preferred default line to call or send messages.
steps.6: Choose the preferred line to use with iMessage, FaceTime, and Apple ID.
steps.7: Choose the eSIM plan as your default line for Cellular Data and do not turn on 'Allow Cellular Data Switching' to prevent charges on your other line.
steps.8: Your eSIM has been installed successfully, please scroll down to see the settings for accessing data.

steps.1: Go to Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
steps.3: Enter your SM-DP+ Address and Activation Code.
steps.6: Choose preferred default line to call or send messages.
steps.7: Choose the preferred line to use with iMessage, FaceTime, and Apple ID.
steps.8: Choose the eSIM plan as your default line for Cellular Data and do not turn on 'Allow Cellular Data Switching' to prevent charges on your other line.
steps.9: Your eSIM has been installed successfully, please scroll down to see the settings for accessing data.

steps.2: Ensure that 'Turn On This Line' is toggled on.
steps.3: Go to 'Network Selection' and select the supported network.

steps.1: Go to Settings > Connections > SIM Card Manager.
steps.3: Tap on 'Scan Carrier QR Code' and tap on 'Add'.
steps.4: When the plan has been registered, tap 'Ok' to turn on a new mobile plan.
steps.5: Your eSIM has been installed successfully, please scroll down to see the settings for accessing data.

steps.1: Go to Settings > Connections > SIM Card Manager.
steps.3: Tap on 'Scan Carrier QR Code' and tap on 'Enter code instead'.
steps.4: Enter the Activation Code (SM-DP+ Address & Activation Code).
steps.5: When the plan has been registered, tap 'Ok' to turn on a new mobile plan.
steps.6: Your eSIM has been installed successfully, please scroll down to see the settings for accessing data.

steps.1: In the 'SIM Card Manager' select your  eSIM.
steps.2: Ensure that your eSIM is turned on under 'Mobile Networks'.
steps.5: Go to Settings > Connections > Mobile networks > Network Operators.
steps.6: Ensure that the supported network is selected.
